raw_beliefs.text: Healthcare is a fundamental human right and should be accessible to all citizens regardless of their ability to pay
Government-run healthcare systems are inefficient and lead to longer wait times and reduced quality of care
Universal healthcare would reduce overall healthcare costs through preventive care and elimination of profit-driven pricing
Private healthcare competition drives innovation and provides better patient outcomes
Medical bankruptcy shouldn't exist - no one should lose their home because they got sick
Universal healthcare systems in other countries demonstrate that quality care can be provided more affordably
Forcing people to pay for others' healthcare through taxes violates individual liberty
A healthy population is more productive and benefits the economy as a whole
